loginWindow.introParagraph:
O hai. Herez som helpful tips fur usin Cryptodog:
  • Cryptodog iz not ceiling cat. Dunt trust it with ur lief!.
  • Cryptodog can't protect u gainst evil pplz, keyloggarz and duz nut anonymize u (iz cat, not onion.)
loginWindow.conversationNameTooltip: Entar a naem fur ur conversashun n share et wiz ppl u'd liek to talk to.
loginWindow.enterConversation: Entr teh naym ov conversashun 2 join.

loginMessage.typeRandomly: Plz type on ur keybord as randomly as posible 4 few secondz.

chatWindow.groupConversation: Group conversashun. Click on usr 4 private chat.
chatWindow.resetKeysWarn: Resettin yur encrypshun keyz will disconnect mew. Yur fingerprints will also chaeng!
chatWindow.fileTransferInfo: ZIP fielz n cat pics only plz. Max file siez: (SIZE) MB.
chatWindow.fileTypeError: Error: Plz maek sure ur filez r an ZIP fiel or cat pic.
chatWindow.fileSizeError: Error: File haz to be smallr den (SIZE) MB plz.
chatWindow.videoChatQuery: (NICKNAME) wants 2 see u on der screen
chatWindow.verifyUserIdentity: Verify this user's identity by asking a secret question. Answers must match exactly!
chatWindow.authRequest: (NICKNAME) wants to verify your identity. Please answer the below secret question to authenticate yourself:
chatWindow.answerMustMatch: Your answer must exactly match the one given by (NICKNAME).

warnings.messageWarning: Warning: You have received an unreadable message from (NICKNAME). This may indicate an untrustworthy user or messages that failed to be received. You may also be running an outdated version of Cryptodog. Please check for updates.
warnings.updateWarning: Warning: Your version of Cryptodog is outdated. Updating to the latest version is strongly recommended! Do not proceed without updating to the latest version.
warnings.missingRecipientWarning: Warning: this message could not be sent to (NICKNAME)

auth.authPhrase1: Every time you have a Cryptodog conversation, you need to authenticate the persons you are talking to.
auth.authPhrase2: One way you can authenticate is by using Cryptodog to ask your friend a secret question that only they would know the answer to.
auth.authPhrase3: You can also contact them via a trusted channel, such as by phone, and ask them to read their fingerprints.
auth.authPhrase4: Fingerprints are identifiers that allow you to authenticate persons. They can change between every Cryptodog conversation.
auth.authPhrase5: Without authentication, someone could be impersonating or intercepting your communications.
auth.AKEWarning: The authentication fingerprints for this contact have changed. This is not supposed to happen and could indicate suspicious behaviour. Please authenticate this contact before chatting with them.

login.facebookInfo: Connect to Facebook Chat via Cryptodog. Set up end-to-end encrypted chats with Facebook friends who are also using Cryptodog.
